author: Staff Reporter
text:
Unidentified persons burgled two houses at Ethiraj Nagar, near Mettupalayam Town, when the occupants of the house had gone out for New Year celebrations. It is learnt that about 320 gm of gold jewellery, Rs. 2.5 lakh and a few other valuables were stolen from these houses.

Rajsingh (45), who has a grocery shop near Mettupalayam Bus Stand, realised that his house was burgled on returning home around 1.45 a.m. He lost about 120 gm of gold jewellery, Rs. 50,000, a watch worth about Rs. 1 lakh, and some silver articles. His neighbour Sakthivadaivel (37), who has a saw mill on Odanthurai Road near Mettupalayam, saw the front door of his house damaged when he returned around 3 a.m. He lost about 200 gm of gold jewellery, and Rs. 2 lakh.
title: Two houses burgled
